column5: I came across some old lures from my Grandfather. No value other than sentimental and the appreciation for their age. Thought I'd share the pics.        Sorry, I flipped the pictures and its still upside down!
I've got the same wooden craw (2nd pic) sitting in a shadow box beside my Mitchell and old Heddon reels.
Great lures!  I'd put them in a shadow box and make sure they're out on display.  :EDIT: bigugli beat me to it
That's pretty neat. Those look hardly used at all. I like seeing vintage fishing equipment thanks.  Pidge
